snippet: A power failure interrupted the Super Bowl in February. The organizers of the Super Bowl at MetLife Stadium want to make sure there’s no repeat in February.
abstract: Power failure interrupted the Super Bowl in Feb 2013 and organizers of this season's Super Bowl at MetLife Stadium want to make sure that there is no repeat; armies of experts are checking and double checking substations, transformers, switches, circuit breakers and other gear at New Jersey's Meadowlands Sports Complex.

byline.original: By KEN BELSON and RICHARD SANDOMIR

lead_paragraph: A power failure interrupted the Super Bowl in February. The organizers of the Super Bowl at MetLife Stadium want to make sure there’s no repeat in February.

headline.main: Working to Keep the Lights On at This Season’s Super Bowl
headline.print_headline: Working to Keep the Lights On at This Season’s Super Bowl
